stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Join us at SREday, the ultimate Site Reliability Engineering conference in London on 14-15 September! Explore 50+ talks, and connect with fellow tech enthusiasts. Grab your early bird tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Join us at SREday, the ultimate Site Reliability Engineering conference in London on 14-15 September! Explore 50+ talks, and connect with fellow tech enthusiasts. Grab your early bird tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Four giants team up for AI safety
stories.Description: OpenAI, Microsoft, Google, and Anthropic have announced the Frontier Model Forum. A joint effort to promote best practices, set standards, and encourage the responsible development of advanced AI.
stories.Tweet: Four giants team up for AI safety 📦 OpenAI, Microsoft, Google, and Anthropic have announced the Frontier Model Forum. A joint effort to promote best practices, set standards, and encourage the responsible development of advanced AI. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/26/openai-google-microsoft-and-anthropic-form-body-to-oversee-safe-frontier-ai-development/

stories.Title: Together for open-source AI
stories.Description: In response to discussions around AI regulations, companies like GitHub, Hugging Face, and Creative Commons propose measures to support open-source AI development, emphasizing its importance.
stories.Tweet: Together for open-source AI 📦 In response to discussions around AI regulations, companies like GitHub, Hugging Face, and Creative Commons propose measures to support open-source AI development, emphasizing its importance. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/26/23807218/github-ai-open-source-creative-commons-hugging-face-eu-regulations

stories.Title: Fueling lunar exploration
stories.Description: NASA's Tipping Point program has awarded $150M to 11 companies, supporting lunar infrastructure and capabilities. From Blue Origin to Varda, these projects will shape the future of space exploration.
stories.Tweet: Fueling lunar exploration 📦 NASA's Tipping Point program has awarded $150M to 11 companies, supporting lunar infrastructure and capabilities. From Blue Origin to Varda, these projects will shape the future of space exploration. #NASA https://spacenews.com/nasa-selects-companies-to-advance-lunar-power-and-other-technologies/

stories.Title: Introducing Crew-7
stories.Description: In August, four astronauts are heading to the International Space Station for important research, new tech demos, and maintenance tasks as part of NASA's SpaceX Crew-7 mission.
stories.Tweet: Introducing Crew-7 📦 In August, four astronauts are heading to the International Space Station for important research, new tech demos, and maintenance tasks as part of NASA's SpaceX Crew-7 mission. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/what-you-need-to-know-about-nasa-s-spacex-crew-7-mission

stories.Title: Surveilling for the skies
stories.Description: The European Space Agency (ESA) is joining forces with Spire Global to create Eurialo, an innovative aviation surveillance system that aims to provide real-time tracking of flights worldwide.
stories.Tweet: Surveilling for the skies 📦 The European Space Agency (ESA) is joining forces with Spire Global to create Eurialo, an innovative aviation surveillance system that aims to provide real-time tracking of flights worldwide. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/esa-satellites-will-monitor-flights-in-real-time-1850674868

stories.Title: SpaceX's heavy-duty journey
stories.Description: Falcon Heavy, SpaceX's powerful rocket, is getting ready for its seventh launch. Today, it lifts Maxar Technologies' Jupiter 3, the largest commercial communications satellite, to geostationary orbit.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX's heavy-duty journey 📦 Falcon Heavy, SpaceX's powerful rocket, is getting ready for its seventh launch. Today, it lifts Maxar Technologies' Jupiter 3, the largest commercial communications satellite, to geostationary orbit. #spacex https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/spacexs-falcon-heavy-will-launch-the-worlds-largest-private-communications-satellite-today

stories.Title: Meet the Overture Maps Foundation
stories.Description: Backed by industry leaders Meta, Microsoft, AWS, & TomTom, this initiative offers free map data to fuel app development, ensuring fair competition and growth.
stories.Tweet: Meet the Overture Maps Foundation 📦 Backed by industry leaders Meta, Microsoft, AWS, & TomTom, this initiative offers free map data to fuel app development, ensuring fair competition and growth. #bigtech https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/26/meta-microsoft-amazon-join-overture-maps-to-vie-with-apple-google.html

stories.Title: Galaxy Unpacked highlights
stories.Description: Missed Samsung's latest event? Don't worry! Here you'll find a recap of all the thrilling announcements directly from Seoul.
stories.Tweet: Galaxy Unpacked highlights 📦 Missed Samsung's latest event? Don't worry! Here you'll find a recap of all the thrilling announcements directly from Seoul. #samsung https://www.engadget.com/samsung-unpacked-july-2023-event-liveblog-100031572.html

stories.Title: Flying into the future
stories.Description: Alef Aeronautics is paving the way for the future of transportation with its flying electric car. With legal approval to take flight in the US, the "Model A" has already secured 2,500 pre-orders.
stories.Tweet: Flying into the future 📦 Alef Aeronautics is paving the way for the future of transportation with its flying electric car. With legal approval to take flight in the US, the "Model A" has already secured 2,500 pre-orders. #alefaeronautics https://electrek.co/2023/07/25/worlds-first-flying-electric-car-us-dealerships/

stories.Title: The return of the Bolt
stories.Description: In a surprising move, GM has announced a new Ultium-based Chevrolet Bolt during their Q2 report. CEO Mary Barra revealed that customers' appreciation for the EV influenced the decision.
stories.Tweet: The return of the Bolt 📦 In a surprising move, GM has announced a new Ultium-based Chevrolet Bolt during their Q2 report. CEO Mary Barra revealed that customers' appreciation for the EV influenced the decision. #generalmotors https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/07/gm-announces-a-new-ultium-based-chevrolet-bolt-during-q2-report/

stories.Title: From China to the world
stories.Description: Radar Auto, an independent brand under Geely, marks its entry into the global electric pickup market with the rollout of the RD6 EV pickup truck.
stories.Tweet: From China to the world 📦 Radar Auto, an independent brand under Geely, marks its entry into the global electric pickup market with the rollout of the RD6 EV pickup truck. #geelygroup https://electrek.co/2023/07/25/chinas-first-electric-pickup-headed-international-markets/

title: Leading companies commit to AI safety, NASA boosts lunar exploration, Don't miss SREday!
